name: django-ai-plugins
description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for Django AI-assisted development

plugins.name: django-expert
plugins.description: Comprehensive Django backend development guidelines and best practices. Expert guidance for models, views, templates, DRF, testing, and deployment.

plugins.name: django-celery-expert
plugins.description: Django and Celery best practices for asynchronous task processing. Expert guidance for task design, worker configuration, monitoring, error handling, and production deployment.
